chapter.title: Terminology Layer
chapter.para: In the following sections we will discuss the Terminology Knowledge Layer of the Knowledge Architecture.

Terminology Knowledge builds on the foundational architecture by creating structured collections of medical terms and codes—such as SNOMED CT, LOINC®, and RxNorm—that define important clinical concepts, including their descriptions, languages, and hierarchical relationships. This layer establishes which valid codes or expressions can be used by higher-level systems as outlined in below.
